name: Oxygone
description:
I BUILT THE GAME WITH THE WRONG LEVELS. WILL UPDATE TOMORROW

Your oxygen generators have been damaged by a creature aboard your ship. Find and repair them to sustain your oxygen levels. 

Controls: 

WASD to move.

Mouse to control the camera.

Left Shift for a short sprint. 

R to restart the level.

Escape to quit the game.

Objectives:

Repair the generators. 

Find wrenches to speed up repair times. 

Find Keycards to open specific doors. 

This game was made during a University based Game Jam with the theme ‘Running out of power’

Developers:

Dave Westcott (Me): Major Blueprints, UI Blueprints and UI. 

Liam Janvier: Level Design and Lighting

Amaan Mirza: Level Design, Lighting and Minor Blueprints. 

Joseph Shibu Abraham: Minor Blueprints, Audio and UI

!!CURRENT KNOWN BUGS!!

The enemy can occasionally get stuck at the generator in the central room. If this happens simply hit 'R' to reload (if you want the experience of an enemy patrolling the level)
